# Pausing this workflow
name: Auto Assign PR
on:
  pull_request:
    types: [opened]
jobs:
  assign:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      pull-requests: write
    steps:
    - name: 'Auto-assign PR'
      uses: peter-evans/assignee@v2.1.0
      with:
          repo-token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          assignees: ${{ github.event.pull_request.user.login }}
